outcome: /JUDGMENT CC 206/2017 OF JUDICIAL MAGISTRATE OF FIRST CLASS - III, KOLLAM PETITIONER/S: SANTHOSH KUMAR A.S AGED 51 YEARS S/0. ANANDAN, RESIDING AT FLAT NO. 7A, KAYALORAM APARTMENTS, THEVARA FERRY, ERN
full_text: Baa 2024/KER/4640 IN THE HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM PRESENT THE HONOURABLE MR. JUSTICE BECHU KURIAN THOMAS WEDNESDAY, THE 174 DAY OF JANUARY 2024 / 27TH POUSHA, 1945 CRL.MC NO. 460 OF 2024 CRIME NO.347/2012 OF Pallithottam Police Station, Kollam AGAINST THE ORDER/JUDGMENT CC 206/2017 OF JUDICIAL MAGISTRATE OF FIRST CLASS - III, KOLLAM PETITIONER/S: SANTHOSH KUMAR A.S AGED 51 YEARS S/0. ANANDAN, RESIDING AT FLAT NO. 7A, KAYALORAM APARTMENTS, THEVARA FERRY, ERNAKULAM, PIN - 682013 BY ADVS. V.JOHN SEBASTIAN RALPH VISHNU CHANDRAN RALPH RETI JOHN APPU BABU GIRIDHAR KRISHNA KUMAR VISHNUMAYA M.B. GEETHU T.A. APOORVA RAMKUMAR RESPONDENT/S: STATE OF KERALA REPRESENTED BY PUBLIC PROSECUTOR, HIGH COURT OF KERALA, PIN - 682031 OTHER PRESENT: SRI. M.C. ASHI (PP) THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON 17.01.2024, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: Bia 2024/KER/4640 BECHU KURIAN THOMAS, J. Cri.M.C.No.460 of 2024 Dated this the 17" day of January 2024 ORDER Petitioner challenges an order refusing to discharge the petitioner under Section 239 of the Cr.P.C. 2. The remedy of a person aggrieved by an order refusing to discharge is to prefer a criminal revision petition. Therefore, reserving the liberty of the petitioner to invoke the revisional jurisdiction against the impugned order, dated 03.01.2024, this Crl.M.C. is dismissed. The Registry shall return certified copy of the impugned order to the petitioner, immedietly. BECHU KURIAN THOMAS JUDGE jm/ Bi ReE et 2024/KER/4640 APPENDIX OF CRL.MC 460/2024 PETITIONER ANNEXURES Annexure 1 CERTIFIED COPY OF THE ORDER DATED 03.01.2024 IN CMP NO. 359/2023 IN C.C NO. 206/2017 OFIRN THE FILES OF JUDICIAL FIRST-CLASS MAGISTRATE COURT-ITT, KOLLAM
